text: Aur bhai ‘Library Partner’. Koi jagah nhi hogi library ke top floor ki jo apan ne dekhi na ho. Khaas kar ki Exam time mei jab ‘kursiyon’ ki chori hua karti thi, apan dono ki bachi hi rehti thi. Chairs ke peeche to lad lete the doosron se. Pehchaan to apni Kota se hi thi, par dosti yahaan hui. Antaragni ke time to apna schedule mostly fix hi rehta tha: Shaam 7 baje nikalna aur raat 3 baje lautna (kuch khaas hua nhi baat alag hai XD). It was really great to have you around Bro. Full chill-out kiya apan ne. All the best for your future! Surely connected rahenge.
author: Rakshit  Paurwal

text: Soni bhai ka smartness level 1000! Kisi bhi cheez ka solution chahiye ho, Soni ke paas zaroor milega. Chahe intern ho, placement, acads ya baaki kuch aur, har jagah chaapa bhai tune. Har Endsem ke baad Marvel ki film dekhne ke plan mei tera role important rehta tha. 1st year mei teri wajah se hi Mini-Militia khelna chalu kiya maine. Pichle kuch time se connected nhi reh paaye Corona ki wajah se, par chalta hai. Finally, tere shabdon mei “MACHAXXX’.
author: Rakshit  Paurwal

text: Bhai teri image ek kaafi sincere aur responsible bande ki rahi mere perspective mein. Mujhe apna woh convo yaad hai jab hum dual-degree ke baare mei soch rahe the. Bas ek tu hi tha jisne mujhe convince kiya civil mei aage progress karne ke liye which led me to apply for dual. Thanks bhai for all that motivation. Apart from that, tune placements mei bhi fighting spirit dikhayi. It's not easy to hold on and not give up. Keep it up bro and stay in touch.
author: Rakshit  Paurwal

text: ‘The Beard Man’ ya phir yoon kahein Civil ka sabse ‘Jugaadu’ aur ‘Resourceful’ banda. Koi bhi course le lo, Kamboj ke paas kuch na kuch resource pada hi milega usse related. Library mei baaki logo ke gaane ek taraf aur Kamboj ke Punjaabi gaane ek taraf. Hall 1 Ki Baraat mei to khoob maje kiye apan ne. Plus uske baad apan 4 logo ka Hall 5 gate ke saamne jo discussion tha, woh aaj bhi yaad hai. Intern se lekar 10 saal baad tak ka future, sab discuss kiya apan ne. Koi library se kuch bhi khaane ke liye nikle, tujhe bas biscuit hi chahiye hota tha. Inhi cheezon ke beech kaafi memories bani apni bhai. Godspeed to you.
author: Rakshit  Paurwal

text: Former roomie aur bhai. Shuru mei kisi senior ne sahi hi bola tha tere liye ki 'ise dekh ke lagta hai ki yeh entertainment de sakta hai'. Tere jaisa khush-mijaaz aur chill banda har group mei hona chahiye. Galaxy ka time abhi bhi yaad hai jab kaam se bachne ke liye mai aur baaki log L20 foyer ke liye nikal gaye aur tune darwaaza baahar se band karwa liya aur andar table lamp jala ke baith gaya tha:). Pata nhi kitne hi late-night roll khaye apan ne OAT jaa kar. Antaragni ki EDM nights ka poora majaa to tere se hi tha, as tu sabse pehle dance start karta tha. "Yahi baatein to yaad aa rhi hain". Anyways, apan ek saal aur to hain hi insti mein. Aise hi chaapte raho.
author: Rakshit  Paurwal

text:
Aur bhai SarthaK!

Tere baare mei kya hi bolun. Jitna likhunga kam padega. Agar kisi ko Chill rehna seekhna ho (in absolute terms) to tujhse seekhna chahiye. Orientation ke pehle din mila tha tujhe, par kya pata tha ki apni frequency itni jabar match karegi. Aur apne socio-political discussions to alag hi level pe rhe. From free market capitalism to RCEP, apan ne sab par commentary kari. Messi vs Ronaldo aur Barca vs Real to background mei rehta hi tha. Har course pe RR kiya apan ne aur pre-registration ke time pe brainstorming bhi. But there is one thing which I learnt from you ki "keep trying, stay calm, things will get sorted in the end". Sahi mei bhai, I couldn't have imagined my IITK journey without you.
author: Rakshit  Paurwal
